channel.title: Username character
channel.description:
Today when i logged onto my comp i discovered people had been abusing the user name box by adding to it names like "omg ///" or "haha ><''?" creating an invalid save file on my comp which becomes annoying to delete.
Is there a way i can stop this?

item.title: Username character
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

Nah everytime i IP ban someone they get around it by changing their char name or sumthing like that, anyways the file which contains their connection details is also unreadable.

Read full topic

item.title: Username character
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Mjoshua Lord Mjoshua
item.description:
@Lord_Mjoshua wrote:

Hmm… well mabey you can ip ban them.

Read full topic

item.title: Username character
item.dc:creator: @spid3rm4n spid3rm4n
item.description:
@spid3rm4n wrote:

I do own the server but it is a hassel because if you create a file with invalid characters (></"?,) the file doesnt save as a txt but as nothing. The problem with this is then you need to download another bunch of apps to remove the file.

Read full topic

item.title: Username character
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Mjoshua Lord Mjoshua
item.description:
@Lord_Mjoshua wrote:

If you own the server, you can delete the character.

Read full topic
